overview:
With an extensive Marketing and Internet technology background, Noam currently serves as CEO and Co-Founder of Predictad (SimplyGen), a market leader in search completion applications.

Noam was also part of HumanClickâ€™s founding team, whose success brought to its acquisition by LivePerson (LPSN). Prior to HumanClick, Noam also led consulting projects in the fields of marketing and after-sale at the Door Consulting Group, plus cross organization projects at Comverse Technology Inc.

Noam holds a B.Sc in Industrial Engineering from the Tel Aviv University, and is a classic cars collector.
